mapper.select: SELECT h.DANJ_NO, h.RIQI_DATE, h.YANGH_STAFF, h.FUJ_STAFF, h.zhij_staff, h.CAOZ_STAFF, h.HOUSE_ID FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_HZ h WHERE h.danj_no IN (SELECT danj_no FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX m WHERE h.DANJ_NO = m.danj_no AND m.SHENH_FLG = '0') AND H.RIQI_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{BEG_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND H.RIQI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{END_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND H.HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID} AND H.FUJ_STAFF_ID IS NULL

SELECT GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_NO, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_SORT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.LOT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.XIANS_LOC, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.NUM, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.ZHIL_QUESTION, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.FUJ_RESULT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.CHUL_OPIN, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YIZ_ADDRESS, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANW_ID, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.CAIGOU_STAFF, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHENH_FLG, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.Huow_Id, (select t.loc_classify from bas_location t where t.loc_id = GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.huow_id) KUB, -- (SELECT T.KUB FROM JC_HWZD T WHERE T.HUOW_ID=GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.huow_id) KUB, bi.item_id SHANGP_NO, bi.item_name CHINESE_NAME, -- bi.YAOP_GUIG, -- 规格 需添加 -- bi.BAOZ_DANW, -- 包装单位 需添加 -- JC_PHWHB.LOT, bla.lot02 SHENGCHAN_DATE, bla.lot03 YOUX_DATE, bi.MANUFACTURER MAKER, -- 生产厂家 -- JC_SPZL.CAIGOU_STAFF, bc.CUSTOMER_CODE DANW_NAME, bc.CUSTOMER_NAME DANW_NO, bo.owner_name YEZ_NAME, bi.owner_id YEZ_ID FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX LEFT JOIN /*JC_SPZL*/ bas_item bi ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID = bi.item_id LEFT JOIN /*JC_DWZL*/ bas_customer bc ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANW_ID = bc.customer_id LEFT JOIN /*JC_HZZL*/ bas_owner bo ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YEZ_ID = bo.owner_id LEFT JOIN /*JC_PHWHB*/ bas_lot_att bla ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID = bla.item_id AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.LOT = bla.lot_id WHERE (GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_NO = #{DANJ_NO} OR #{DANJ_NO}='%') AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHENH_FLG = '0' AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YEZ_ID =bi.owner_id
